message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, worth $1,500,000 to you personally. Considering its unique attributes and the importance it holds for you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
